snippet: An art dealer in Massachusetts is opening a show of works by Hannes Beckmann, a Bauhaus-trained painter who was also a photographer and stage designer.
abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; David Hall Fine Art in Wellesley, Mass, will host restrospective of Bauhaus-trained painter, photographer and stage designer Hannes Beckmann; Columbia University curator Roberto C Ferrari will lecture on pre-Raphaelite painter and poet Simeon Solomon at Dahesh Museum of Art; lives of artist couple who spent time in Woodstock, NY, are chronicled in Joseph P Eckhardt book Living Large: Wilna Hervey and Nan Mason.
lead_paragraph: An art dealer in Massachusetts is opening a show of works by Hannes Beckmann, a Bauhaus-trained painter who was also a photographer and stage designer.

headline.print_headline: Belated Retrospective for a Bauhaus Artist
headline.main: A Belated Retrospective for a Bauhaus Artist
